title: Papirkrigen.mp4
description:
The Paper War, 2007


...is one 50 min. film portraying everyday life in Christiania in a difficult time.
The state and the police put a unprecedented pressure on residents, visitors and businesses.
Publicly it is called normalization but internally it feels like police state methods.
This brings a question forward; do Denmark have to set of rules a so-called double-standard regarding freedom of speech, labor protection, human/children&#039;s right and the right to be and walk about. These and other issues is a part of everyday life in Christiania as showed in the films.
